title: India seeks US tech to scan vehicles non-intrusively - Economic Times
content: India seeks US tech to scan vehicles non-intrusively  Economic Times
description: CRPF director general Kuldiep Singh said, "a team of officials including those from the Ministry of Home Affairs will soon visit the US for onsite study of the multi-mode passive detection system." The system will be able to scan large trucks, cargo and containers. Security agencies had intercepted a truck load of rice in Jammu and Kashmir's Nagrota in 2020.
